scenario_text.value:
(That boy looked a lot like the companions of
the Four Sovereign Monsters we’ve met.)

Come to think of it, you could call all those
people we met at the shrines ghosts.

That must’ve been Zhuqiaomon’s human
companion.

Zhuqiaomon? You mean the last of the
Sovereign Monsters?

(Could he be the ghost we’ve been seeing? But
why would he leave the shrine?)
